content: 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch knit 1 row 14 rs knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch knit 1 work row 13 and 14 2 times total bind off in pattern sleeves note - work each sleeve separately in the round and place a start of round marker 32 34 36 38 stitches leave a 6 tail so you can sew close the hole under each arm use the larger needle set up round knit to the end repeat round 1 until the sleeve measures 4 ¼ 6 7 ½ 8 ½ inches from the under arm or to desired length edging round 2 k2tog knit to the end of the round 31 33 35 37 stitches round 3 purl 1 knit 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch purl 1 round 4 knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch knit 1 work rounds 3 and 4 2 times total bind off in pattern taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights repeat as worked for the 2nd sleeve reserved 2015 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale finishing weave in your end sew the buttons on block and enjoy page 3
